document.full_text: nato blamed forces loyal to muammar gaddafi for a fire in an oilfield in libya on thursday, and denied the western military alliance had launched air strikes in the area.
document.title: nato: gaddafi's forces to blame for oilfield fire
lines_and_colors: nato blamed forces loyal to muammar gaddafi for a fire in an oilfield in libya on thursday, and denied the western military alliance had launched air strikes in the area.
